import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  

const layoutProps = {
  
};
export default class MDXContent extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props)
    this.layout = null
  }
  render() {
    const { components, ...props } = this.props

    return <MDXTag
             name="wrapper"
             
             components={components}><MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"javascript-library"}}>{`JavaScript library`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"keypair"}}>{`KeyPair`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`This class provides key pair functionality (generating key pairs, encoding key pairs).`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"parameters"}}>{`Parameters`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`publicKey`}</MDXTag>{` `}<MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="li"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="strong" props={{"href":"https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String"}}>{`string`}</MDXTag></MDXTag></MDXTag>

</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"getpublickey"}}>{`getPublicKey`}</MDXTag>

<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{}}>{`TODO: Add code example(s)
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"getsecretkey"}}>{`getSecretKey`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Get the secret key.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h4" components={components} props={{"id":"examples-1"}}>{`Examples`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{}}>{`TODO: Add code example(s)
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>

</MDXTag>

<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`nearClient`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h4" components={components} props={{"id":"examples-4"}}>{`Examples`}</MDXTag>

</MDXTag>

manage this key pair.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h4" components={components} props={{"id":"parameters-4"}}>{`Parameters`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`newAccountId`}</MDXTag>{` `}<MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="li"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="strong" props={{"href":"https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String"}}>{`string`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{` id of the new account`}</MDXTag>

<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`originatorAccountId`}</MDXTag>{` `}<MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="li"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="strong" props={{"href":"https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String"}}>{`string`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{` existing account on the blockchain to use for transferring tokens into the new account`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h4" components={components} props={{"id":"examples-6"}}>{`Examples`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{}}>{`TODO: Add code example(s)
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"viewaccount"}}>{`viewAccount`}</MDXTag>
